item.name: Blood Bowl: Team Manager – The Card Game
Claustrophobia
item.comment: best light fantasy 2-player. Waiting for expansions!

item.name: Duel of the Giants: Eastern Front
Gears of War: The Board Game
Genoa
item.comment: not a 2-player for sure. Its good game, but I dont think its worth to play with 2 or 3 players.

item.name: K2: The Avalanche
item.comment: Quite good little expansiond, but badly designed :( very unclear. Prefer to play without it because of unclear graphical design... I always miss there is avalanche and fall down.

item.name: Kingpin
item.comment: fake neuroshima hex, disapointing, expensive game :(

item.name: Lord of the Rings: The Confrontation
Neuroshima Hex! Steel Police
item.comment: great. not so easy to play, but I love it. Should be in core set. Waiting for next armies....

item.name: The Pillars of the Earth: Builders Duel

item.comment: in opposite to PowerGrid it is good 2players game!

item.name: Roll Through the Ages: The Bronze Age

Village
item.comment: fantastic modern euro, top of its genre!
